scripts.refresh: rm -rf node_modules/ && rm package-lock.json && npm i
scripts.homey-build: browserify lib/variable-management.js --standalone variableMgmt -o settings/variable-management.js && homey app build
scripts.homey-run: npm run homey-build && homey app run
scripts.homey-install: npm run test && npm run homey-build && homey app install
scripts.homey-publish: npm run test && npm run homey-build && npm run fix && homey app publish
